```python
def is_isogram(word):
    if not isinstance(word, str) or len(word) == 0:
        return False
    cleaned_word = re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z]', '', word).lower()
    letter_counts = Counter(cleaned_word)
    return len(set(letter_counts.values())) == 1
```

```python
def is_isogram(word):
    if not isinstance(word, str) or not word:
        return False
    word = re.sub(r'[^a-zA-Z]', '', word).lower()
    count = Counter(word)
    return len(set(count.values())) == 1
```

def is_isogram(word):
    if not isinstance(word, str) or not word:
        return False
    filtered_word = ''.join(c.lower() for c in word if c.isalpha())
    letter_counts = Counter(filtered_word)
    return len(set(letter_counts.values())) == 1
```

    count = Counter(word)
    return len(set(count.values())) == 1
```

```python
def is_isogram(word):
    if not isinstance(word, str) or len(word) == 0:
        return False
    word = word.lower()
    letters = re.sub(r'[^a-z]', '', word)
    counts = Counter(letters)
    return len(set(counts.values())) == 1
```
